DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study assess efficacy safety atomoxetine compare placebo outpatient binge eat disorder .
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet DSMIV criterion diagnosis bingeeating disorder least last 6 month In addition , subject report least 3 binge eat episode per week last 6 month prior randomization Have concurrent symptom bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa Women pregnant , lactating , child bear potential use adequate contraceptive measure Patients display clinically significant suicidality homicidality
